query.statement: SELECT '레시피' AS NM ,ROUND(100 - ((100 * SUM(CASE WHEN CNT > 1 THEN CNT ELSE 0 END)) / SUM(CNT))) RATE FROM ( SELECT RECIPE_NAME AS NM , COUNT(*) CNT FROM FSM_REAL_RECIPE_MST WHERE UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND MENU_CD IN ( SELECT MENU_CD FROM FSM_REAL_MENU_MST WHERE UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND HALL_CD = #HALL_CD# AND LENGTH(MEAL||CORNER) > 0 AND MENU_DATE = #MENU_DATE# ) AND RECIPE_NAME NOT IN ( SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'FS0035' ) GROUP BY RECIPE_NAME ) A UNION ALL SELECT '주재료' AS NM ,ROUND(100 - ((100 * SUM(CASE WHEN CNT > 1 THEN CNT ELSE 0 END)) / SUM(CNT))) RATE FROM ( SELECT MAIN_ITEM_CODE1 AS NM , COUNT(*) CNT FROM FSM_REAL_RECIPE_MST A WHERE UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND MENU_CD IN ( SELECT MENU_CD FROM FSM_REAL_MENU_MST WHERE UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND HALL_CD = #HALL_CD# AND LENGTH(MEAL||CORNER) > 0 AND MENU_DATE = #MENU_DATE# ) AND MAIN_ITEM_CODE1 NOT IN ( SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'FS0036' ) GROUP BY MAIN_ITEM_CODE1 ) A
